statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE '%son%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_interactions > 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type ORDER BY customer_id DESC, num_interactions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_description FROM customer_interactions UNION SELECT customer_id, communication_content FROM communication_history ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, communication_type, communication_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN communication_history ON interactions.interaction_id = communication_history.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(history_id) AS total_communications FROM communication_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_communications > 3
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT interaction_type, notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, registration_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT communication_id, communication_type, details FROM Communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
